item.description: On Halloween we will be joining up with Margaritas Concord for Full Moon Madness! We will be having a dinner/ paranormal 101 show and ghost hunt of the old Concord jail! Where else can you have great Mexican food and eat in a old jail cell! Spots will be very limited. We are taking reservations now for this event. Dinner will begin at 8:00pm with a fajita bar of chicken, Steak , Rice and Beans. Then the paranormal 101 show with a ghost hunt of the jail to follow! The cost is $15 plus tip for this great Halloween Adventure! Spaces are limited.Â
item.name: Dinner/ Paranormal 101 / Ghost Hunt Margarita's Concord
